flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=4>>4 students are absent.
So, 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 students are present in school.
Out of the 36, 36 x 3/4 = <<36*3/4=72>>72 students are in the classroom.
This means, 36 - 72 = <<36-72=-36>>-36 students are in the canteen.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
